# idsec_cmgr_pool (Data Source)

The Connector Management service pool data source. It reads the pool information and metadata and is based on the ID of the pool.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_cmgr_pool" "example_pool" {
  pool_id = var.pool_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `pool_id` (String) The ID of the pool to get.

### Optional

- `assigned_network_ids` (List of String) The networks assigned to the pool.
- `components_count` (Map of Number) The number of components on the pool.
- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the pool.
- `description` (String) The description of the pool.
- `identifiers_count` (Number) The number of identifiers on the pool.
- `name` (String) The name of the pool.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update time of the pool.
